title: 1 Magnificent High-Yield Stock Down 15% to Buy and Hold Forever
snippet: An above average yield, a long history of dividend growth, and a business that's seeing headwinds turn to tailwinds. What's not to like?

title: 3 Reasons to Buy Chevron Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
snippet: Chevron boasts one of the best dividend-paying track records in the oil patch. The company has increased its payout for 38 straight years -- the second-longest streak among oil companies. It has also delivered peer-leading dividend growth over the past decade.

title: Top Stock Reports for JPMorgan Chase, Chevron & Shopify
snippet: JPMorgan Chase posts 43.9% annual gain, fueled by loan demand and high rates, but faces expense growth and asset quality concerns.

title: Chevron's Q2 Free Cash Flow Rises - CVX Stock Looks Cheap
snippet: Chevron reported a 15% increase in free cash flow (FCF) quarter-over-quarter (Q/Q), and following the closing of the Hess acquisition, its FCF outlook is now stronger. Assuming Chevron ups its dividend by 4%,
